name: WPLMS SENSEI MIGRATION
author: HK (VibeThemes)

sections.description:
WPLMS Sensei Migrate plugin is a free plugin developed to help users to migrate all of their Woocommerce Sensei courses to WPLMS courses. The users do not have to worry a lot and perform various steps to migrate their courses. All this is done by a simple click. With the courses all of the quizzes and the units will be migrated successfully with just one click.

Tutorial On how to setup and get started : link

More Information

Visit the VibeThemes for documentation, support, and information on getting involved in the project.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘WPLMS Sensei Migrate’
  3. Activate WPLMS Sensei Migrate from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download WPLMS Sensei Migrate.
  2. Upload the ‘wplms_sensei_migrate’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate WPLMS Sensei Migrate from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘WPLMS Sensei Migrate’
  3. Activate WPLMS Sensei Migrate from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download WPLMS Sensei Migrate.
  2. Upload the ‘wplms_sensei_migrate’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate WPLMS Sensei Migrate from your Plugins page.

Does it require some plugin to get started?

Yes, The plugin needs the Woocommerce Sensei plugin and the Vibe Customtypes plugin to be activated to work.

Do I need the WPLMS theme to begin?

No, You need the Woocommerce sensei plugin and Vibe Customtypes plugin to begin but after migrating you need the WPLMS theme to see all the changes.

Can I revert changes if I don’t like it after migrating?

Yes, after migration you can check all the courses and if you feel its not correct and again wants to move to Woocommerce Sensei plugin, then firstly you have to activate the Woocommerce Sensei plugin and then you can see the button to revert all the changes.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development at VibeThemes.
